headline.main: DR. MELVIL DEWEY DEAD IN FLORIDA; Noted Educator, Library Expert and Founder of Lake Placid Club Stricken at 80. ADVOCATE OF EFFICIENCY Championed Decimal System and Simplified Spelling--Long Secretary of New York State. Eager for Labor Saving. Chief Librarian at Columbia. Founds Lake Placid Club.

snippet: LAKE PLACID, Fla., Dec. 26 (AP). --Dr. Melvil Dewey, internationally known educator, inventor of the decimal classification system used in libraries, and spelling reform advocate, died here today of a cerebral hemorrhage. He celebrated his eightie...
